donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
Detection of tuberculosis has been a long standing issue in Syria with detection rate below 50% which leads to delay in the start of treatment and further spread of the disease. 
The Project will address the issue of DOTS for pulmonary TB patients, MDR patients, the engagement of all health providers (Public and Private), support people in vulnerable and poor areas to receive proper treatment and to strengthen the National Tuberculosis Programme Management capacity.

project_descr: Support of the National Programme "Tuberculosis" in the Syrian Arab Republic - SYR 607-G01-T
project_title: Support to the National TB Programme
